RecordOperationSpec.Name: Delete Financial Transaction Extension Record Operation
RecordOperationSpec.Description: Deletes a Financial Transaction Extension Record for a given recurring gift.
RecordOperationSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPOperationImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_FINANCIALTRANSACTIONEXTENSION_DELETE ( @ID uniqueidentifier, -- RevenueID which is the key @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier -- ID of the user/changeagent ) as begin begin try if @ID is null raiserror 100000 'No recurring gift ID given.'
-- use the system generated delete routine to allow proper recording of the deleting agent exec USP_USR_FINANCIALTRANSACTION_EXTENSION_DELETEBYID_WITHCHANGEAGENTID @ID, @CHANGEAGENTID
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;
end

StandardPrompt.Text: Are you sure you want to delete this Recurring Gift Payment Schedule record?
